gw.pl.messaging.entity

Interface MessageContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bean, com.guidewire.commons.entity.BundleProvider, java.lang.Comparable<Bean>, IGosuObject, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Keyable, KeyableBean, com.guidewire.pl.domain.messaging.gen.MessageContextStubI, com.guidewire.commons.entity.Sourceable, Versionable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessageContextCoreExt

    public interface MessageContext
extends com.guidewire.pl.domain.messaging.gen.MessageContextStubI
    Context object used to generate all outgoing messages. An instance of this class is created when an event is fired; that instance is then passed to the "Event Message" ruleset.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoot

        java.lang.Object getRoot()
        Gets the root object of this event, namely, the object that generated the event.

      • getDestID

        int getDestID()
        Returns the ID of the destination to which any messages created will be sent.

      • getSessionMarker

        SessionTool getSessionMarker()
        Gets the session marker. The session marker can be used to store and retrieve session variables for later reference by a different rule within the same session. This should not be confused with Message.putEntityByName() and Message.getEntityByName() which allow entities to be attached to the message for lookup at send and reply time.

      • getEventName

        java.lang.String getEventName()
        Gets the event name of this event.

        Gets the current user.

      • getPendingMessages

        Gets the array of pending messages.
